div.p: To my lord brother Heraklas Ambrosios, epimeletes of sitokrithon for the 4th indiction, Phibion, decurion, greetings. Give to my master Domitios the tribune from my camp (?), ten Italic modii of sitokrithon, that is, 10 mod. I, the aforementioned, have signed. Translation: R.S. Bagnall â€“ G. Tallet, ZPE 196 (2015) 184
